publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1933 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Approval of SSIsâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the following instruments be approved: the draft Justices of the Peace (Tribunal) (Scotland) Regulations 2001, the draft Part-Time Sheriffs (Removal Tribunal) Regulations 2001, and the draft Sex Offenders (Notice Requirements) (Foreign Travel) (Scotland) Regulations 2001.
